```{r}
system.time({
temp <- matrix(nrow = 1000, ncol = 3)
i <- 1
n=100000

for(i in 1:nrow(temp)){
e <- rnorm(n=n, mean=0, sd=5)
x1 <- rnorm(n=n, mean=100, sd=7)
x2 <- rnorm(n=n, mean=1000, sd=10)
y <- 5+ 4* x1+ 0.7* x2 +e

b_ols <- lm(y~ x1+ x2)

temp[i, 1] <- b_ols$coefficients[1]
temp[i, 2] <- b_ols$coefficients[2]
temp[i, 3] <- b_ols$coefficients[3]
i <- i+1
}
})

```
